description:
The secret of the Saigusa family is explained to the Little Buster crew, and Riki wants to help his friend cope with her new Infamy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dareka ni Soba ni Ite Hoshikattanda
I Wanted Someone to Stay by My Side
Je voulais quelqu’un à mes côtés
誰かにそばにいて欲しかったんだ
